title: NBA Season Preview FT. Paul Pierce | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: NBA Season Preview FT. Paul Pierce | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
The NBA season is BACK and so is WHAT'S BURNIN. The boys are joined by Paul Pierce to preview the upcoming season and give their picks for some major NBA awards. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
